New Records: Fox moved to the 2nd most steals in the Sacramento era with 671 steals
Key Match Events: The Kings held the Jazz to 14 third-quarter points
Post-Match Reflections: We had to play desperate. You don’t want to start a season 0-3, (and) obviously with two of them being at home [it was important]. So we couldn’t let a younger team come in and outwork us.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Domantas Sabonis finished with a game-high 28 points, 11 rebounds, and four assists
DeMar DeRozan added 20 points, eight assists, and four rebounds
Jordan Clarkson’s 21 points led the Jazz
